Outstanding Renovation
This exceptional home, extended and totally renovated with craftsman's attention to detail, presents a character weatherboard exterior with a stylish, contemporary urban interior. With every convenience considered and quality appointments and finishes throughout, this 4 bedroom plus study, family home enjoys an enviable, cul de sac position in the Birts Hill locality.
Offering generous space for family living, the kitchen/dining/living area features full-height windows to take advantage of the panoramic mountain view and showcases an eye-catching Ergofocus suspended fireplace. With entertaining in mind, bi-fold doors open out to a spacious alfresco deck complete with kitchen facilities and mains gas BBQ.
The sleek and stylish kitchen provides a stunning island bench, gleaming 2-pac cabinetry that extends to full-wall storage in the living room and Miele appliances including 900mm range, oven and warming drawer plus integrated microwave, fridge, freezer and dishwasher and an adjoining butler's pantry with the bonus of access to a handy attic storage space.
The indulgent main bedroom boasts a private, elevated balcony (think tranquil summer evenings), an ample WIR and double vanity ensuite with a king-size frameless shower. The family bathroom mirrors the quality of the ensuite with the addition of a luxe soaker bath.
2 further bedrooms are of excellent size and the large 4th bedroom is currently in use as a home theatre. The study is fully fitted and presents an inspiring work-from-home setting.
On the lower level, behind custom designed security gates, awaits a dream 4 car garage with 2 auto doors, epoxy resin floor, sensor lighting and gantry. Further features include powder room, laundry, CCTV, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling and family-friendly backyard.
Walk to Birts Hill and Warrien Reserves, minutes to primary schools, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar plus Chirnside Park SC, Croydon Station and shops, Ringwood transport interchange, Eastland and Eastlink.
Inspection is a must where a full list of this impressive home's attributes will be available.
Also visit the stand alone website at: www.44alicestreetcroydonnorth.com

Description:
Style, Class and Comfort - (On Service Road)
This stylish 3 year old double storey brick veneer townhouse is classy, comfortable and fresh making it very appealing to those buyers searching for their 1st home, a family home with low maintenance, those looking to downsize or as a solid investment with loads of benefits.
Perfectly positioned with its own street frontage and strolling distance to Croydon North shopping centre the home comes complete with 4 good sized robed bedrooms, the main bedroom downstairs has a walk in robe and full ensuite.
The formal entry with stunning hardwood floors will begin your journey through the home to discover the 3 living areas, starting with the formal lounge area that may also be used as a dining room. The real hub of the home is the modern open plan family meals area that is adjacent to the kitchen and takes in views to the backyard and entertaining deck. Upstairs the spacious rumpus living area will be a favorite for the children to call their space or you may choose to make it the families theatre room for movie nights.
The amazing gourmet kitchen is magnificently appointed with quality stainless steel Bosch appliances, dishwasher, stone bench tops plus loads of cupboards and bench space to ensure the chef of the family makes their kitchen rule for any meal occasion.
Before we take in the outdoors we mustn't forget other internal features which include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, split system air conditioning, main bathroom upstairs with separate toilet, powder room downstairs, high ceilings, polished Tasmanian Oak floors through all walk areas, carpeted bedrooms for comfort, amazing amount of storage cupboards plus light filled interiors with soft modern colours and tones.
Stepping out from the family room you will find the undercover entertaining deck that will be the ideal spot to enjoy family gatherings, parties, casual BBQ's, alfresco dining, a cool afternoon drink or a leisurely weekend breakfast with a coffee and the paper.
No need for a lawn mower as the low maintenance yard has artificial grass and low maintenance gardens which means more quality time to enjoy with the family and kids.
Car accommodation is well taken care of in the large double garage that has remote controlled door plus internal access to the home for safe easy unloading of the children and the groceries.
There is space in the drive for an extra vehicle, plus space at the front in the service road for visitor parking.
Total convenience within strolling distance to Croydon North shopping centre, cafes, restaurants, schools, public transport plus all other facilities you may need.
Your stylish comfortable lifestyle will begin with your viewing today.
